# ChoiceForm Design System

This is the documentation for the `@choice-ui/design-system` package.
A desktop-first UI component library built for professional desktop applications, built with React and TypeScript.
The library provides a comprehensive set of components with rich interactivity and enterprise-grade features.

## Overview

- Package: `@choice-ui/design-system`
- Version: 1.0.3
- Storybook: https://storybook.choice-ui.com/
- Built with: React 18.3+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite
- Testing: Vitest with workspace configuration
- Styling: Tailwind Variants + SCSS modules

## Utilities

- [formatBytes](https://choice-ui.com/utils/format-bytes/README.md): Convert byte values into human-readable file size strings
- [formatDate](https://choice-ui.com/utils/format-date/README.md): Intelligent date formatting with i18n and relative time support
- [mergeProps](https://choice-ui.com/utils/merge-props/README.md): Intelligently merge React props with event handler chaining
- [mergeRefs](https://choice-ui.com/utils/merge-refs/README.md): Combine multiple React refs into a single ref callback
- [tcx](https://choice-ui.com/utils/tcx/README.md): Tailwind CSS class merging with classnames syntax

## Hooks

- [useDirection](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-direction/README.md): Text direction management with context support for RTL/LTR
- [useDisableScroll](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-disable-scroll/README.md): Temporarily disable scrolling on parent containers for overlays
- [useIsomorphicLayoutEffect](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-isomorphic-layout-effect/README.md): SSR-safe layout effect with useAsRef utility
- [useLazyRef](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-lazy-ref/README.md): Lazy initialization of expensive objects that persist across renders
- [useMergedValue](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-merged-value/README.md): Seamlessly handle controlled and uncontrolled component states
- [useModifierKeys](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-modifier-keys/README.md): Global tracking of keyboard modifier keys (Shift, Ctrl, Meta)
- [usePress](https://choice-ui.com/hooks/use-press/README.md): Unified press interactions with mouse, touch, and keyboard support

## Styling System

- [Theme System](https://choice-ui.com/styles/README.md): Comprehensive Tailwind CSS theme with desktop-optimized colors, dark mode, and design tokens

## Architecture

- **Component Structure**: Each component follows a consistent pattern with main component, stories, styles, and utilities
- **Styling System**: Tailwind Variants for component styling with SCSS modules for complex styles
- **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript support with strict mode enabled
- **Accessibility**: ARIA compliant with keyboard navigation and screen reader support
- **Performance**: Optimized with React.memo, virtualization, and lazy loading where appropriate
- **Internationalization**: Built-in i18n support for date/time components and number formatting

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies (pnpm required)
pnpm install

# Start development environment
pnpm dev

# Run Storybook
pnpm core:storybook

# Run tests
pnpm test

# Build library
pnpm build

# Format code
pnpm format
```

For detailed API documentation, usage examples, and interactive demos, visit the individual component documentation links above or explore the [Storybook](https://choice-ui.com/).
